newsitem.title: USA: New York coal/ore/scrap fixtures - Aug 22.
newsitem.headline: New York coal/ore/scrap fixtures - Aug 22.

text.p: COAL - PanOcean TBN 147,000/10 tonnes coal Hampton Roads and RichardsBay/Kwangyang or Pohang 1-15/10 $9.25 seven days shinc Posco.
PanOcean TBN 110,000/10 tonnes coal Port Kembla and Newcastle/Kwangyang and Pohang 8-22/10 $6.32 15 days shinc Posco.
Ocean Cherry 55,000/10 tonnes petroleum coke Long Beach/AntRottAmsterdam 1-10/9 $8.50 five days shinc Koch. (corrected)
ORE - Polycarp 110,000/10 tonnes iron ore Tubarao/Kaohsiung 5-15/10 $9.20 40,000/38,000 CSC. (adds ship)
